It's hard to move in huge caves or canyons. That's why I wanted to develop a piton, but I noticed a problem:

Pitons need edges in the landscape to be securely able to put me up. Because of this I developed climbing slime. Instead of throwing a piton, the rope is attached to a sticky ball of slime. A neon impulse that is transferred through the rope can suppress the stickiness of the slime for a short time to release it from a wall.

By right clicking the piton is thrown, as in using a hinge. As far as the slime hits a block, you'll be pulled in this direction immediately. Plus the climbing slime needs to be charged with neon energy.
